info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren, northeastern Saratoga and west central Washington Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Glens Falls, or near Glens Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Lake George Village, Fort Edward, Corinth, Hartford, Bolton Landing, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Wilton, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, South Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne, Bolton, Hadley, Lake George and Fort Ann. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 16 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
